page.title: 05RECREATION : CHILDRENS GROUP
page.content: Majorettes meet on Fridays . We pay 50p a week. After keep fit we practice our routines and special routines for Carnivals. We wear royal blue leotards with a frill and sequinned hats. BROWNIES. There are four Brownies packs in the village, for girls aged 7 years to 10\ yrs. This year they celebrated 75 years of guiding with a party where they let off 75 balloons. YATTON ATHLETIC FOOTBALL CLUB meets every Saturday at 10.00am to 12.00 on practice days we do exersises and learn soccer skills. Our kit is orange shirts,black shorts and orange socks. CRUSADERS is really fun.We do all sorts of things there.They teach us about God and Jesus.We meet on Sundays,and during the week we have activities.Once a year we go on camp.
